downloadTitle: MVP Session 24: Build Scaled Drawings and Space Plans in Visio 2010 (working file)
downloadDescription: Practice creating scaled drawings by using space plan diagrams in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 24.
detailsSection: Practice creating scaled drawings by using space plan diagrams in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, created as a companion to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 24. MVP Sessions Video 24 covers several features that help you create scaled drawings and space plans using Visio 2010. Use this diagram to follow along with the video and practice working with Visio 2010 to automatically calculate drawing data to scale, saving you time and helping ensure diagram accuracy.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working file to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Watch the Build Scaled Drawings and Space Plans video (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Get_Started/How_To/Pages/Session-24-Build-scaled-drawings-and-space-plans.aspx).
